JobFullDesc: Company DescriptionServiceNow is making the world of work, work better for people. Our cloud‑based platform and solutions deliver digital workflows that create great experiences and unlock productivity for employees and the enterprise. We're growing fast, innovating faster, and making an impact on our customers' and employees' lives in significant and important ways. With over 6,900 customers, we serve approximately 80% of the Fortune 500, and we're on the 2020 list of FORTUNE World's Most Admired Companies.® We’re looking for people who are ready to jump right in and help us build on our incredible momentum, our diverse, engaged workforce, and our purpose to make the world of work, work better. Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow.Job DescriptionThe PositionWe are looking for a Head of Manufacturing Industry Go-To-Market, EMEA to join our Manufacturing Vertical Solutions organization. The ideal candidate is a Manufacturing industry expert with knowledge of Manufacturing pain points, business processes, system landscapes, and solutions crossing key industry segments such as discrete, process, automotive, and consumer goods. S/he has a point of view on how operational transformation can differentiate the employee, customer, partner, supplier, and dealer experience in the Manufacturing industry. S/he has experience building, launching and selling enterprise software solutions for the Manufacturing industry. And s/he is passionate storyteller with the ability to communicate an innovative vision and roadmap for the Manufacturing industry. This role will serve as ServiceNow’s EMEA go-to-market leader and a key partner to ServiceNow’s Sales organization. Head of Manufacturing Industry Go-To-Market, EMEA will closely align with our account teams in several strategic Manufacturing clients to seed and develop strategic opportunities based on Manufacturing industry solutions. And s/he will build trusted relationships with customer and partner executives, partner with sales leaders and account teams, and be a significant contributor to the revenue growth in our top Manufacturing accounts. What you get to do in this role:The ideal candidate has demonstrated ability in the following key areas: 1) Industry Experience: 10+ years working in or selling into Manufacturing organizations as a subject matter expert, business development, business consulting, project manager, product marketing, solution consulting, or similar capacity.  Familiarity with Manufacturing front office and operational processes and the landscape and patterns of Manufacturing industry core ERP, SCM, CRM, and IoT systems.2) Strategic Planning: Ability to create and drive the Manufacturing Go-To-Market strategic business plan with clear pathways to revenue targets across target account strategies, industry solutions, partnerships and marketing. History of being accountable to revenue and pipeline goals. 3) Solution Sales Success: Passion for and track record of collaborating with EMEA sales teams (Account Executives, Solution Consultants, Product Sales) as a trusted advisor to seed and develop strategic opportunities based on industry solutions.  Experience enabling Sales on the Manufacturing industry message, solutions and resources available, developing high touch and at-scale sales programs, and partnering with EMEA sales teams to seed and advance strategic solution-based opportunities. 4) Cross-Functional Execution: Proven ability to generate results in a highly matrixed organization, collaborating with Sales, Pre-Sales, Marketing, Sales Enablement, and Alliances organizations around a common Manufacturing industry strategy. 5) Customer Engagement: Ability to present to large customer audiences and build credibility with CxOs.
